edgeTypes.description:
Connects a GitHub account to a post that they authored.

Examples of posts include issues, pull requests, and comments.

Connects a GitHub entity to its child entities.

For example, a Repository has Issues and Pull Requests as children, and a
Pull Request has comments and reviews as children.
Connects a GitHub pull request to the Git commit that it merges.
Connects users to posts to which they gave a üëç reaction.
Connects users to posts to which they gave a ‚ù§Ô∏è reaction.
Connects users to posts to which they gave a üéâ reaction.
Connects users to posts to which they gave a üöÄ reaction.
Connects a commit on GitHub to the corresponding raw Git commit.

nodeTypes.description: NodeType for a GitHub pull request
nodeTypes.name: Pull request

nodeTypes.description: NodeType for a GitHub code review
nodeTypes.name: Pull request review

nodeTypes.description: Represents a particular Git commit on GitHub, i.e. scoped to a particular repository
nodeTypes.name: Commit

nodeTypes.description: NodeType for a GitHub bot account
nodeTypes.name: Bot

nodeTypes.description: A combined user identity as specified to SourceCred
nodeTypes.name: Identity

userTypes.description: A combined user identity as specified to SourceCred
userTypes.name: Identity

edgeTypes.description: Connects an initiative to it's dependencies.
Connects an initiative to it's references.
Connects an initiative to it's contributions.
Connects an initiative to users who champion it.
Connects a contributor to an entry node.

nodeTypes.description: An initiative supernode, describing a scoped improvement to a project from proposal to completion.
nodeTypes.name: Initiative

nodeTypes.description: A contribution entry node, to easily includecontributions when other plugins don't add it to the graph.
nodeTypes.name: Contribution Entry

nodeTypes.description: A dependency entry node, to easily includecontributions when other plugins don't add it to the graph.
nodeTypes.name: Dependency Entry

nodeTypes.description: A reference entry node, to easily includecontributions when other plugins don't add it to the graph.
nodeTypes.name: Reference Entry
